original_text: But the Jews in Thessalonica heard news about what Paul was doing in Berea. They heard that he was telling people God's message about Jesus. So some of them went to Berea. They said bad things against Paul to the people there. As a result, a large crowd became angry with Paul.
korean_text: 데살로니가에 있는 유대인들은 바울이 하나님의 말씀을 베뢰아에서도 전하는 줄을 알고 거기도 가서 무리를 움직여 소동하게 하거늘

sentences.original_text: But the Jews in Thessalonica heard news
about what Paul was doing in Berea
sentences.korean_translation: 바울이 베레아에서 무엇을 하고 있는지에 대한

sentences.original_text: They heard that he was telling people
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 그가 사람들에게 말하고 있다는 것을 들었습니다

sentences.original_text: So some of them went to Berea
sentences.korean_translation: 그래서 그들 중 일부가 베레아로 갔습니다

sentences.original_text: They said bad things against Paul
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 바울에 대해 나쁜 말을 했습니다

sentences.original_text: As a result, a large crowd became angry
sentences.korean_translation: 그 결과, 큰 무리가 화가 났습니다
